Html:
Hi

I have two markers that overlap, i.e. the first one is almost completely hidden by the second one that was added last.

When I place the mouse pointer over the markers, I receive the OnMarkerEnter event for the second marker. When i click on the marker, the OnMarkerClick event refers to the first marker. How can I achieve that both the OnMarkerEnter and OnMarkerClick events refer to the same marker?   

Thanks
to be really sure save marker on enter event and compare it with click event
